verbose_text: Furthermore, U-50,488 treatment increased the translocation of PKCdelta-EGFP from 11% +/- 2% to 47% +/- 5% and 15% +/- 3% to 70% +/- 9% after a prior pre-incubation in gallein (100 muM), a G betagamma inhibitor, and PTX (200 ng/mL), respectively (XREF_FIG), suggesting that PLC mediates PKCdelta activation by KOR in a G betagamma - and G alphai -independent process.
